issue.title: #23: Automatic data for insersion into labbook

content.raw: Could this be done from within a lyse script rather than being baked into the lyse GUI? I've thought about making one of our lyse scripts "print" the graph to OneNote (since desktop OneNote is installed as a printer destination) but never got around to trying it.
content.html: Could this be done from within a lyse script rather than being baked into the lyse GUI? I've thought about making one of our lyse scripts "print" the graph to OneNote (since desktop OneNote is installed as a printer destination) but never got around to trying it.
